long_description: after that success, we decided to invest in the neighboring city with one of the best quality of life indicators in portugal, vila nova de gaia. its beaches, tourism and excellent structure in terms of services, transportation, culture, health and leisure captivated us to invest in projects in this location. we are committed to the environment. through an impact reduction policy we seek to manage environmental resources in the most conscious and responsible way. é a escolha ideal para quem procura a elegância urbana aliada a um estilo de vida verdadeiramente equilibrado. 50 % vendido. o mais recente empreendimento da 4a foi notícia no público imobiliário, onde são destacadas as vistas sobre o rio douro, a sua extensa oferta residencial e a classe energética a que oferece.

generated_description: 4a empreendimentos is a construction company based in vila nova de gaia, porto, portugal. established in 2016, the company began its operations in 2017 with its first remodeling project in porto. in 2018, 4a empreendimentos launched the plaza dom henrique i project in vila nova de gaia, marking the start of several other development projects in the city. the company focuses on constructing high-quality living spaces, adhering to environmental impact reduction policies, and ensuring efficient project execution. portugal's stable infrastructure, low crime rates, and political stability make it an attractive investment destination for 4a empreendimentos.
